text: Phir Allah Taalaa ney aik kawway ko bheja jo zamin khod raha tha takay ussay dikhaye kay woh kiss tarah apney bhai ki naash ko chupa dey woh kehnay laga haaye afsos! Kiya mein aisa kerney say bhi gaya guzra hogaya kay iss kawway ki tarah apney bhai ki laash ko dafna deta? Phir to (bara hi) pashemaan aur sharminda hogaya
